description: Dive into the realm of 3D animations and design integration this week. Discover how a 3D carousel adds flair to your scrolls, and explore the power of particle trails using Three.js. Penpot's new design tokens promise better code synergy, while CSS animations take a nod from retro cartoons, offering a minimalist yet lively approach. Learn about CSS masonry layouts and their innovative proposals, including Apple's new WebKit approach. From fractal islands to the intricacies of JS scope, this week's digest is a treasure trove of inspiration and technical insights.
joke: Why do JavaScript developers prefer using 'let' when they throw a party? Because it allows for block-level scope!
challenge: Create a mesmerizing 3D particle trail animation using Three.js. Your task is to simulate a dynamic movement that responds to user interactions, such as mouse movements or scroll events. Feel free to use a combination of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with the option to integrate WebGL for added depth. Aim to create a visually stunning and fluid experience that captivates users and showcases your creativity in 3D environments.
